_header: The Joy of our heart is done & passed away
_description: Another translation of the Latin text of Lamentations 5:15, at the beginning of cap. XV in Dives and Pauper — one quatrain

BodAsh750.Note:
Variant form of Dives and Pauper, consisting of extracts; may not
                    include this portion.

BLRoy17Cxx.Transcription:
þe ioy of our herte is done & passid aweyto sorwe & care
                    is turnyd oure pleyþe garlond of our hed is falle to
                    groundeþat euer did we synne wel away þe stounde

BLRoy17Cxxi.Transcription:
þe ioȝe of our hert is doneand passynd awey to
                    sorweAnd care is turnyd our pleyþe garlond of our hede is fallyn
                    to groundeþat euer we synnyd al wele away þe
                    stounde

GULHun270.Transcription:
Þe ioy of our herte is don and pasyd aweyTo sorwe and care is
                    turnyd our playÞe gerlond of our hefd is fallyn to
                    groundeÞat euere dede we synne welaway þe stounde
GULHun270.Editions:
Barnum,  Priscilla Heath,
                        ed.  
             Dives and Pauper.
EETS
         2 vols. o.s. 275 (1976) and o.s. 280 (1980): 2.245.
